summary: The code creates a Qt application UI with video display, QGraphicsView and push button, along with complex design elements including buttons, sliders, panels, tabs, labels, and progress bars.

details.comment: This code defines a user interface for a main window with a central widget, a frame for displaying video content, and a QGraphicsView to render the video. The window has a fixed size of 800x486 pixels.

details.comment: This code defines a user interface layout with various widgets, including QPushButtons and QSlider. The buttons have text labels in Chinese for "保存标注", "选择目标", "清空目标", and "开始推理". The layout is nested within other widgets to create a complex UI design.
details.content:
<widget class="QPushButton" name="save_btn">
